charges.charge_description: 21:844 MARIJUANA - POSSESSION/Simple Possession of a Controlled Substance(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant plead guilty under Order of Probation Under 18 U.S.C. 3607 without a judgment of conviction first being entered. SENTENCE: Fine- $1000, SPA- $25, Drug Testing Fee- $115. Total fine and fees- $1140.00 due 10/10/2012. Defendant placed on 12 months probation with drug testing. JUDGMENT OF CONVICTION ENTERED: Original sentence under 18:3607 is revoked upon admission of Allegation 1,3,4, on 12/20/2012 and Judgment of Conviction is entered. The remaining balance is to be paid in full within the added 2 months of Probation.
